resources.string: Use Powercards to increase your chances
Virtual Stock Market is fun and realistical way of presenting the stock market through a defined storyline. With prices rising and falling every round let us see who will be the next Harshad Mehta.
In Virtual Stock Market we have included fun stocks related to our theme of Mafia like guns, oils and much more. So get ready to experience this simulation of the stock market.
With continuous news which you will receive from the Mafia Times regarding the shady deals of mafia. Use your gut and invest to maximize the profit and be the winner.
We have some promising powercards which will make your life easy as a trader. With Loan-a-cap and Insider Trading you can select the perfect stock for your victory.

trade_o_live is educating people across India about Stock Market Trading and Investing Since 2021 . The Founder and CEO , Mr Priyanshu Shirsat has won IFA ( Youngest Entrepreneur In Stock Market 2021) and has 5+ years of experience in stock market. We have trained 500+ Traders and Investors . Featured on ZEE BUSINESS (IFA AWARDS 2021)
In this course you will learn how human psychology plays an important role in Stock Market
As a trader you must have gone through emotions. The course will help you to control your emotions during the trading and reduce your losses while making your overall portfolio
